code: export var hideAlert=function hideAlert(){return{type:"SET_ALERT",payload:{}};};export var setAlert=function setAlert(alert){return{type:"SET_ALERT",payload:alert};};export var setError=function setError(message){return{type:"SET_ALERT",payload:{message:message,severity:"error"}};};export var setInfo=function setInfo(message){return{type:"SET_ALERT",payload:{message:message,severity:"info"}};};export var setSuccess=function setSuccess(message){return{type:"SET_ALERT",payload:{message:message,severity:"success"}};};export var setWarning=function setWarning(message){return{type:"SET_ALERT",payload:{message:message,severity:"warning"}};};
